RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Claiming Purse 9100. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAMBLIN CHROME speed to the front to lead at all poles, holding sway at the wire under stout handling NEVER SORRY bit tardy from with a slight lunge, inside trip angled out for place spot. ALPHA LEA slight steady first turn, dug in through the stretch run for show spot. TROY BOY off rail run throughout with no late kick in the stretch run. LAST CHANCE DANCE good position throughout with no kick in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Never Sorry
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tardy from with a slight lunge, inside trip angled out for 2d

ENTRY.NAME: Ramblin Chrome
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front to lead at all poles, holding sway at the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Last Chance Dance
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position throughout with no kick in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Alpha Lea
ENTRY.COMMENT: slight steady first turn, dug in stretch run for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Troy Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run throughout with no late kick in the stretch run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 121 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRINCESS ELLIE good position to turn, three wide run went well clear on the wrong entire stretch run with a good effort to the wire. SPOOKY LITTLE GIRL sent to the front while well handled to the stretch, no match late. MS. DEBBIE ALAN bit tardy, rushed inside to the turn, up for show spot. OPIE'S GIRL sharp break outside, chased, pressured leader to turn, folded. SHAMANS IMAGE never menaced throughout. LATE BLOOMBOPPER always well back throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. Debbie Alan
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tardy rushed inside to the turn, up for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Spooky Little Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent to the front, well handled to the stretch, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Late Bloombopper
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W
ENTRY.COMMENT: always well back throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Shamans Image
ENTRY.OWNER: Barker Scott W and Barker Carol
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Opie's Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp break outside, chased, pressured leader to turn, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Ellie
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to turn, three wide run went well clear good effort

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Regis tered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WARIS inside trip to the turn, angled out for clear run while well handled to go clear in the final sixteenth. ZUPITA sprinted to the lead, angled over, led to the stretch but outgamed late while holding the place spot. COMPETITIVE FIRE slow into stride from gate, rallied stretch late for show spot. SPICY SOMMELIER chased pace to the turn battled stretch with no response late. SELENA SING raced between horses early on while evenly with no late kick. ARKLAHOMA SOUL dropped back from the turn with no response.

ENTRY.NAME: Competitive Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow into stride from gate, rallied stretch late for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Waris
ENTRY.OWNER: Rowena Beck Racing Stable LLC and Mayfield Jr Frank
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip to the turn, angled out for run, well handled, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Selena Sing
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced between horses early on while evenly with no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Arklahoma Soul
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back from the turn with no response

ENTRY.NAME: Spicy Sommelier
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to the turn battled stretch with no response late

ENTRY.NAME: Zupita
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted to the lead, angled over, let in stretch, outgamed late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GREENSFELDER quick between horses, dueled to the turn, ,stayed game to wire. HESTON three wide run to turn, stayed tenacious to wire outgamed. KOBE BEACH saved ground to the stretch, up rail for show spot late. HECTOR B raced back to the turn while floating widest to improve late. FROOME (IRE) inside run to the stretch, weakened in the final sixteenth. SHERLOCKED tried to keep up to turn, faded back in the stretch run. PASION AZTECA between horses early on while fading back to the turn.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 17800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Rac es At A Mile Or Over Since August 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not S tarted For Less Than $15,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PENUMBRAS MAKER perfect position to far turn, rallied on in the stretch, cleared. GOSHEN tracking to three to turn, led past the quarter pole into stretch while no match late. MISS GOODBAR no speed from the gate, raced back to far turn, came running late. BACKYARD HEN with leader to far turn, weakened in the stretch run. QUARIA BRAVA tried to keep up for a half with little response when needed. WILDCAT DREAM speed to the front, led to the half with little left from far tur. HONEYBELL never a factor. LADY JENNEVIERE had a steady fade throughout.

ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed from the gate, raced back to far turn, came running late

RACE.FOOTNOTES: KEENE ON JENNY chased leader to the turn, roused with a wide trip, clear. RUNNETH OVER chased to pair to the stretch, rallied along for place spot. PARTY NEVER ENDS speed to the front, led to eighth pole, weakened late held third. GRANNY ANN tried to keep up between horses early on, evenly to the wire. RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 13600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have No t Started For Less Than $10,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HANDSOFFTHEGOODS rail run to quarter pole, angled off rail between horses to be along in time. SMART DRESSER inside speed to the stretch, kept on game but outbid to the wire. COLOR FIELD pushed on to the turn, between horses into stretch for third spot. PAST IMPERATIVE no speed to the turn with a late run in the stretch to improve. SWELTER turned in a dull effort while lugging in while closing the gap. ALL ABOUT CROGE off rail to the stretch with no response when needed. OUTSLEWTHEM pressed pace to far turn, stayed to stretch, gave in readily late. CHEESEBURGER always trailed and never threatened.

ENTRY.COMMENT: rail run to quarter pole, angled off rail between horses in time

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Ove r Since August 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Tha n $15,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YONO good position to far turn, went inside throughout stretch run and cleared off in the final stages to the wire. FAST FALL pressed pace to the half, cleared in stretch but run down in the final sixteenth but bested the rest to the wire. GOLDEN REIGN inside speed to the half but could not keep up and settled for show spot. DIAL HIM UP outside run throughout while never a real threat. P K WOOD had striking position to the half but gave in readily from that pole. DRAFT CAPITAL had an awkward start, breaking in a tangle and always trailed throughout. Race 8 the finish time was hand timed when the beam at the wire was interfered with, all other internal fractions were correct.

ENTRY.NAME: Draft Capital
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in a tangle and always trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Yono
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to far turn, when inside stretch run, cleared off

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Fall
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva Silver Lining Racing LLC Tennant Angela Tennant Kurt and 4C Sons LL
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace to the half, cleared in stretch run down bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Reign
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the half, could not keep up settled for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Dial Him Up
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside run throughout while never a real threat

ENTRY.NAME: P K Wood
ENTRY.COMMENT: striking position to the half, gave in readily from that pole
